definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: What should the candidate bring for the Speaking test?
sentences.chinese: 在口试中考生应该带什么？

sentences.english: When you go into the interview, speak clearly so you can be heard.
sentences.chinese: 口试时要口齿清晰让考官和搭档能够听清你的话。

sentences.english: The Monday venue is the Foreign Affairs Hotel of Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 周一的口试考场为沈阳师范大学外事宾馆。

sentences.english: The girl mustered up her courage to face the interview.
sentences.chinese: 女孩胀起勇气接受口试。

sentences.english: What kind of accents can be heard in the Listening and Speaking tests?
sentences.chinese: 在听力和口试中可能会听到什么地方的口音？

sentences.english: The interview will be conducted in the Third floor of the Center for Japanese Studies.
sentences.chinese: 本次口试将于台师大校本部温州街日本研究中心举行。

sentences.english: The student whose number came up would face an oral exam.
sentences.chinese: 座位号被拿出来的学生将面临口试。

sentences.english: The candidate will take an oral examination.
sentences.chinese: 那个应试者将参加口试。

sentences.english: The company will give only oral tests to the applicants.
sentences.chinese: 公司只以口试来甄先应征着。

sentences.english: The oral test for college English majors-Grade IV( OTEM4) has gradually been popularized nation-wide.
sentences.chinese: 英语四级口试逐步在全国范围内推广。

sentences.english: The length of time you spent waiting in the exam area.
sentences.chinese: 在口试区你花了多久等候时间。

sentences.english: The BHIET consists of both written and oral tests.
sentences.chinese: 饭店英语等级考试包括笔试和口试两部分。

sentences.english: Should you think favorably of my application, I would like to have an interview.
sentences.chinese: 如对本人之应征优先考虑，恳请惠予口试之机会。

definition: to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
Putonghua Proficiency Test, an official test of spoken fluency in Standard Chinese for native speakers of Chinese languages, developed in the PRC in 1994
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 hua4 Shui3 ping2 Ce4 shi4

definition: an examiner/an official conducting an exam
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
